original_text: Only a person who is from the priest's family can eat the holy gifts. Another person who is living in the priest's house must not eat the holy gifts. If a person is being paid to work for the priest, he must not eat the holy gifts.
korean_text: 일반인은 성물을 먹지 못할 것이며 제사장의 객이나 품꾼도 다 성물을 먹지 못할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Only a person who is from the priest's family
Another person who is living in the priest's house
must not eat the holy gifts
If a person is being paid to work for the priest
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 한 사람이 제사장을 위해 일하며 보수를 받고 있다면

sentences.original_text: he must not eat the holy gifts
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 거룩한 선물을 먹어서는 안 된다
